original_text: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:
korean_text: 너희 믿음의 확실함은 불로 연단하여도 없어질 금보다 더 귀하여 예수 그리스도께서 나타나실 때에 칭찬과 영광과 존귀를 얻게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: That the trial of your faith
being much more precious than of gold
though it be tried with fire

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 존귀와 영광을 받게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: at the appearing of Jesus Christ:
